title: Who are the best contemporary Spanish authors? - Quora

response.answer_text: Main authors everyone should read:- Roberto Bolaño (Chile)- Gabriel García-Márquez (Colombia)- Mario Vargas Llosa (Perú)- Jorge Luis Borges (Argentina)- Julio Cortázar (Argentina)- Mario Benedetti  (Uruguay)- Juan Carlos Onetti (Uruguay)- Javier Marías (Spain) Secondary (or not so classic, but very good)- Francisco Coloane (Chile)- Ricardo Piglia (Argentina)- Alan Pauls (Argentina)- Enrique Vila-Matas (Spain) I think that Isabel Allende, Arturo Pérez Reverte and Carlos Ruiz Zafón are a lot more comercial. Easy and entretaining to read but no so deeply capable of emotion us.

- Roberto Bolano- Gabriel Garcia-Marquez- Isabel Allende- Jorge Luis Borges- Mario Benedetti- Javier Marias- Mario Vargas LLosa - Juan Bonilla- Arturo Perez Reverte - Carlos Ruiz-Zafon (Only "La Sombra del Viento")
